title: Android 11 broke connection to my Chromecast devices and "Cast to nearby" doesn't work. How to fix?
content: I tried to cast from different streaming apps with the same result.... It only show "cast to nearby device", but cannot find any. I went to google home, my chrome devices are thwre and I can see their "screensaver" pictures as displayed kn TV, but not cast to them.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
